The data economy

The technology

What are zero knowledge proofs?

Zero knowledge proofs enable certain properties of our identity to be shared and verified by a counterpart without revealing or sharing the underlying data.

Properties

Why does my business need this technology?

Zero Knowledge Proofs are designed to provide your business with the following:

Identity security

Identity privacy

GDPR compliance

Reduced threat of data leakage

Use case

How does it work?

Identity verification: provide proofs of identity and personal details, without revealing or sharing the data
